channel.title: My Blog Page
channel.description: Travel news from all around the world

item.title: Madeira to open up to vaccinated tourists
Where can I travel?
item.description: Which Popular World Destinations Can American Travelers Visit Right Now?

item.title: Thailand's Tourism Sector Campaigning to Reopen by July
item.description: Tourism officials in Thailand have announced a new campaign to reopen the countryâ€™s borders for international travel.

item.title: Hong Kong Tourism Board prepares for reopening of travel
item.description: The Hong Kong Tourism Board (HKTB) has announced its plan to prepare for the recovery of tourism and the resumption of international travel.

item.title: Eurowings to boost presence in Berlin as rivals depart
item.description: Eurowings is stepping up its commitment in Berlin and will open a new base at Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER) on April 1st.

item.title: Seychelles to reopen to tourism this month
item.description: The Seychelles will reopen to tourists, regardless of vaccination status, from March 25th.

item.title: Escape to Greece to launch to British travellers
item.description: Escape to Greece will launch this month, offering bespoke holidays to 27 destinations in the country, with over 400 hand-picked properties.
